Subscription.Query:
<QueryList> <Query Id="0" Path="Microsoft-Windows-CodeIntegrity/Operational"> <!-- Code Integrity failures --> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-CodeIntegrity/Operational"> *[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-CodeIntegrity'] and (Level=2 or Level=3) and (EventID=3001 or EventID=3002 or EventID=3003 or EventID=3004 or EventID=3010 or EventID=3023)]] </Select> </Query>
<Query Id="1" Path="Security"> <!-- Invalid image or page hash --> <Select Path="Security"> *[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Security-Auditing'] and (Level=4 or Level=0) and (EventID=5038 or EventID=6281)]] </Select> </Query>
<Query Id="2" Path="System"> <!-- Failed loading a kernel driver --> <Select Path="System"> *[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Kernel-PnP'] and Level=3 and EventID=219]] </Select> </Query> </QueryList>
